ActionSequence.Condition: -- can this base object be assigned to a system role? exists("DialogTable", sqland(sqlcompare("TableName", Type(), "string", "equal", "none"), "uid_dialogtable in (select UID_DialogTableReference from DialogValidDynamicRef where UID_DialogColumn = 'QER-1D7E2DF935964A3781EE665411E31F1C')"))
ActionSequence.CodeLiteral:
// load any system roles that this base object is in
dataProvider.AddMemberRelationTable("ESetHasEntitlement", "Entitlement", "AddMembership", "RemoveMembership", "MemberOf");
